name: Galaxy Tuition
description: Harmony Music School has been nurturing musical talent for over 15 years in Bangalore. Our comprehensive programs cater to students of all ages and skill levels, from absolute beginners to advanced performers. We focus on both classical and contemporary music education with state-of-the-art facilities.
